comment.body: @zloyden It seems this is caused by https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/381f71bf708530603f1f7dcfcd9293cd1a79a6ee . The exclusion doesn't work and I have to revert to `~nintendo.com`. May potentially be another bug, IDK.

issue.title: www.gentside.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.gentside.com/news/insolite/etes-vous-timide-ou-confiant-cette-illusion-doptique-permettrait-de-vous-percer-a-jour_art103379.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gentside.com%2Fnews%2Finsolite%2Fetes-vous-timide-ou-confiant-cette-illusion-doptique-permettrait-de-vous-percer-a-jour_art103379.html) ### Comment > Hello! I use the Allow nonintrusive advertising filter ( https://easylist-downloads.adblockplus.org/exceptionrules.txt ) and would like to unblock the podcasts on the website. However, it looks like the French filter blocks them. Could you please unblock the podcasts? ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/csxsq9zyxqg44gssggog4oc40kgk48kathkf8s3d28.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/mcrtt5bl5z4044o0ksowssww84ck4g0c6s04d6kcwo.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.3 System version: | Android 13 Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `AdGuard`, `DNS`, `doh`
Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

Language-specific:
AdGuard French Userscripts: | AdGuard Extra

comment.body:
Hi,

Per information, it seems that loading message in video frame issue is resolved when activating easylist filter instead of adguard base filter.

This issue occured in Start app only.

Maybe you can update adguard base filter according to last updates of easylist filter ?

Thanks,
François-Régis

Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
From: Adam ***@***.***>
Sent: Wednesday, January 24, 2024 9:05:33 AM
To: AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters ***@***.***>
Cc: frbona ***@***.***>; Comment ***@***.***>
Subject: Re: [AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters] www.gentside.com (Issue #170996)


So can i can use Start for browsing with Adguard ?

On my device HTTPS filtering doesn't work correctly in Start app, but if it works fine for you, then why not.

—
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub<https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/170996#issuecomment-1907596981>, or unsubscribe<https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ASD3T57PN5BPJNK4N55J37TYQC6E3AVCNFSM6AAAAABCAHOCBCVHI2DSMVQWIX3LMV43OSLTON2WKQ3PNVWWK3TUHMYTSMBXGU4TMOJYGE>.
You are receiving this because you commented.Message ID: ***@***.***>
